channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 mtr standing water, 1st March
item.description:
Following an earlier visit and works to eliminate pooling outside 54 dark lane the pooling has in fact increased and the debris collecting in the void is again being thrown at my property by speeding vehicles driving through the standing water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stantons Drive, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slabs either side of drainage channel are loose and tip up causing trip hazard and when wet, water to spray upwards when stood on., 29th February
item.description:
Outside the door of the flats (449) on Swindon Street on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 451, High Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain on eastbound side of A40 just before crossing, 29th February
item.description:
The drain on the A40 eastbound side just before the crossing by the Burlington House B&B and the cut through to Campden Road is blocked. When it was raining a large puddle formed directly on top of it. The following day after the rain the puddle was still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked paving stones and a trip hazard, 29th February
item.description:
The cracked paving stones are outside 43 Mead Road in Cheltenham. The issue has developed over the last year and was made worse when the paths were dug up for new fibre relaying. The paths have not been put back correctly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor repair after island removal,400 days ago, 29th February
item.description:
Alas not a pot hole ,but since December 2022 800,000 Vehicles have driven over this repair , not damaging cars Or H G V s but the fabric of the near by building

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding near to property on front lawn, 29th February
item.description:
In front lawn outside Orchard View, GL52 9PT. Severn Trent Water have checked and confirmed not a clean water leak and no waste water assets in this area. Please investigate and update resident at Orchard View. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
